messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: Support for the Lib Dems has continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European levels in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader.

messages.title: STOP BREXIT FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Build a fairer economy by providing free childcare from 9 months and giving every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.
Tackle the climate emergency by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulating all low-carbon homes by 2025.
Transform our mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.

issues.education: Give every child the best start in life.
issues.environment: Protect our global and local environment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Tonbridge and Malling for over 30 years. My priorities for our constituency are to end Brexit, protect our global and local environment, develop our local transport networks, ensure our schools and universities meet our needs, protect our local and national economy, and stand up for the rights of all constituents.

politicalExperience.achievements: Bringing real-world skills to Tonbridge and Malling's constituents.

politicalExperience.role: Trustee of Kent Opera and Kent Music, Board Member of Invicta Radio, Committee Member of Tonbridge in Europe and on National Executive of The European Movement

images.caption: Richard Morris: a strong local voice for Tonbridge and Malling.

leaflet.additionalNotes: After three and a half years of turmoil and stagnation, we now have the opportunity to stop Brexit.
